You body produces a hormone called relaxin so your muscles will spasm and cramp more then usual.

Preeclampsia is high blood pressure associated with other symptoms. Persistent headache that doesn't go away with tylenol; seeing spots of light or having blurred vision; sudden onset swelling in hands and face, to where you appear different in the mirror to yourself; pain in the upper right abdominal (liver pain) that doesn't go away; as well as protein in your urine.
Oh.. well at least there's a better idea of what to expect. Thanks mommies:) really do appreciate the inputs! @anujanu1 hope this helps you too!

question: Advice ladies?.. i experience a bit of muscle strain that is from my thumb to my elbow where it feels like a muscle is being pulled there and its really uncomfortable and somewhat painful abit.its been happening a few times now but occassionally.last week i experienced a major headache that made me felt as if i was coming down w a fever. I didnt dare to take any paracetamol so i just slept on it and drank water. Im not sure what is preeclampsia really so im asking if u ladies could help me with this. Any ideas if what im experiencing is just a common pregger symptom?
title: possible preeclampsia?
